item.title: Need help with anti dupe
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Open Client.java
Declare:

public boolean tradeAccepted;

Find:

declineTrade(boolean tellOther)

Just put under that line

if(!tradeAccepted){

and add a } to the end of declineTrade method.

Now find:

public void openTrade()

Under it put:

tradeAccepted = false;

Close client.java and open ClickingMost.java

Now find:

(other.tradeConfirmed2)

and above that put

c.tradeAccepted = true;

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with anti dupe
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

here is a regular delta’s decline method.

[code] public void declineTrade() {
if (disconnected) {
declineTrade(true);
}
declineTrade(true);
}
public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
other.sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
other.declineTrade(false);
}

	for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
		if (item.amount < 1)
			continue;
		if (item.stackable) {
			addItem(item.id, item.amount);
		} else {
			for (int i = 0; i < item.amount; i++) {
				addItem(item.id, 1);
			}
		}
	}
	canOffer = true;
	tradeConfirmed = false;
	tradeConfirmed2 = false;
	offeredItems.clear();
	inTrade = false;
	trade_reqId = 0;
            other.closeInterface();
	other.inTrade = false;
}[/code]

make it kick just make it

[code] public void declineTrade() {
if (disconnected) {
declineTrade(true);
}
declineTrade(true);
}
public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
other.sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
other.declineTrade(false);
}

	for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
		if (item.amount < 1)
			continue;
		if (item.stackable) {
			addItem(item.id, item.amount);
		} else {
			for (int i = 0; i < item.amount; i++) {
				addItem(item.id, 1);
			}
		}
	}
	canOffer = true;
	tradeConfirmed = false;
	tradeConfirmed2 = false;
	offeredItems.clear();
	inTrade = false;
	trade_reqId = 0;
            other.closeInterface();
	other.inTrade = false;
            disconnect = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic
